attributes.action: Give monthly COVID-19 tests for children and staff in secondary schools.
attributes.additional_details: This will help us prevent a resurgence of cases when pupils and staff go back to school. If there is a resurgence, the school can temporarily close down for a deep cleaning or introduce a local lockdown.
attributes.background: Give COVID-19 tests for staff and pupils in secondary schools to help prevent a resurgence in COVID-19 cases.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/550053
